item.title: CVE-2018-8849|2024-08-05T07:10:45.899Z -- medtronic -- n%27vision%20clinician%20programmer
item.description: Medtronic N'Vision Clinician Programmer 8840 N'Vision Clinician Programmer, all versions, and 8870 N'Vision removable Application Card, all versions does not encrypt PII and PHI while at rest.
